mapper.select: select a.*, b.userName , c.custName, d.soppTitle, e.custName ptncName, f.desc03 salesTypeN from swc_sales a left join swc_user b on a.userNo = b.userNo left join swc_cust c on a.custNo = c.custNo left join swc_sopp d on a.soppNo = d.soppNo left join swc_cust e on a.ptncNo = e.custNo left join swc_code f on a.salesType = f.codeNo where a.attrib not like 'XXX%' and a.custNo = #{custNo} order by salesFrdatetime desc

select a.*, b.userName , c.custName, d.soppTitle, e.custName ptncName, f.desc03 salesTypeN from swc_sales a left join swc_user b on a.userNo = b.userNo left join swc_cust c on a.custNo = c.custNo left join swc_sopp d on a.soppNo = d.soppNo left join swc_cust e on a.ptncNo = e.custNo left join swc_code f on a.salesType = f.codeNo where a.attrib not like 'XXX%' and a.soppNo = #{soppNo} and a.compNo = #{compNo} and a.soppNo != 10005223 order by salesNo
